Class Matrix2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • Matrix2D
  • public class Matrix2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a square matrix with some methods to manipulate such matrices.
    Version:
    Fall 2019
    Author:
    Jim Teresco, modified by Prof. White and (your names here)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Matrix2D​(int size)
      A basic constructor to allocate but not otherwise initialize a matrix, so by the rules of Java, all entries are initially 0.

        A basic constructor to allocate but not otherwise initialize a matrix, so by the rules of Java, all entries are initially 0.

        public void set​(int row,
                int col,
                int value)
         throws Matrix2DIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Element mutator. Throws an exception of the row or column is not valid.
        Parameters:
        row - The row index of the element to be changed.
        col - The column index of the element to be changed.
        value - The new value to be assigned at the input row and column location.
        Throws:
        Matrix2DIndexOutOfBoundsException

        public int get​(int row,
               int col)
        throws Matrix2DIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Element accessor. Throws an exception if row or column is not valid.
        Parameters:
        The - row of the element to be returned.
        The - column of the element to be returned.
        Returns:
        The element located at the input row and column.
        Throws:
        Matrix2DIndexOutOfBoundsException

      • maxValue

        public int maxValue()
        Returns the largest value in the matrix.
        Parameters:
        Returns - the largest value in the matrix.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object other)
        Compare two matrices for equality. Two matricies are equal if they have the same dimensions and the same elements at every location in the matrix. Note that we must take a parameter of type Object to override the inherited equals method.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        other - The Matrix2D object to be compared to this matrix.

      • add

        public Matrix2D add​(Matrix2D other)
             throws Matrix2DSizeMismatchException
        Nondestructive matrix-matrix add. Throws an exception if the input matrix does not have the same dimensions as this matrix. Create a new array whose elements are the sum of the elements of the input matrix and this matrix for the same row and column indexes.
        Parameters:
        other - The Matrix2D object to be compared to this matrix.
        Returns:
        A new matrix whose elements are the sum of the input matrix and this matrix for the same row and column indexes.
        Throws:
        Matrix2DSizeMismatchException

      • scale

        public void scale​(int by)
        Multiples every entry in this matrix by the input value.
        Parameters:
        by - The amount by which the matrix is scaled.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return the matrix as a String that will print in a nice format.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The matrix as a String that will print in a nice format.
